programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: On a quiet Sunday morning in 1941 the pride of the US Navy rode calmly at anchor in the island paradise of Hawaii, far away from the war raging in Europe. That calm was abruptly shattered by the arrival of Imperial Japans carrier taskforce that, in an unprecedented surprise attack, killed thousands and destroyed the American battleships that stood between Japan and its desire for a Pacific empire. This "day of infamy" seemed to be the most successful pre-emptive strike in history and a disaster for the United States. But was it? Seconds from Disaster takes a fresh look at one of historys greatest events and investigates whether the attack was in fact a fatal blow to Japans quest for victory.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: December 3rd 1984. Evening descends on Bhopal, a bustling Indian city of nearly 1 million people, many, factory workers living in the slums surrounding the city. As they cook, eat and prepare for bed, few have any inkling that, in a few terrifying hours, more than 3,000 of them will choke to death in clouds of toxic gas. "MIC" used at the plant to create the pesticide Sevin, is one of the most toxic substances known to man. It causes severe damage to the human respiratory system resulting in suffocation by drowning. After years of investigation and analysis; industry experts, workers and survivors testify as to what happened that night in December as Seconds From Disaster uncovers the astonishing chain of events that led to one of the biggest man-made disasters of all time.

programme.title: Situation Critical
programme.desc: Situation Critical is an American documentary series produced in partnership with the National Geographic Channel and explores devastating disasters and violent conflicts. In some cases these events changed more than the lives of those involved, altering the course of modern history. Among the events featured in this series are a North Hollywood shootout between Los Angeles Police Department and a pair of bank robbers, a Unites States Air Force pilot that is shot down over Bosnia and struggles to evade capture and several military operations that took place in the Middle East following the invasion of American forces.

programme.title: Situation Critical
programme.desc: Situation Critical is an American documentary series produced in partnership with the National Geographic Channel and explores devastating disasters and violent conflicts. In some cases these events changed more than the lives of those involved, altering the course of modern history. Among the events featured in this series are a North Hollywood shootout between Los Angeles Police Department and a pair of bank robbers, a Unites States Air Force pilot that is shot down over Bosnia and struggles to evade capture and several military operations that took place in the Middle East following the invasion of American forces.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Every year, thousands of train crashes and devastating plane disasters occur worldwide. From hijackings to technological failures, these incidents highlight the inherent dangers of travel. Despite daily advancements, a single mistake can lead to catastrophic outcomes. Join us as we explore the 10 most significant air crashes and train accidents, uncovering the tragic events that capture global attention and impact countless lives.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Hang on tight and whatever you do… dont look down! An old TV antenna thats been part of the San Antonio skyline for nearly sixty years is past its use-by date… and it has to come down before it falls down. Question is: how do you drop something thats heavy and unwieldy over 500 feet to the ground… smack bang in the middle of a city? Riley teams up with a bunch of high-altitude riggers to get a birds eye view of one of the most dangerous fixes hes ever been on. And hes taking you with him. Anyone scared of heights better watch from the safety of the couch at home.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Grab your hard hats and load up on coffee, Worlds Toughest Fixes is working the night shift in Salt Lake City, Utah. We have just three days to pull off the nearly impossible; lift a 300 thousand pound bridge between two buildings with mere inches to spare. Theres no room for error on this fix. This lift is chock full of obstacles. Were working in the middle of downtown on Main Street, weve got a commuter train running through our worksite, power lines all around, 5-stories of parking garages beneath our feet, two massive cranes working in tandem, and all work has to be done in the dead of night. Its fair to say the conditions here are less than ideal. Its going to take a miracle and a lot of hard work to pull off this fix.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Reality series in which professional rigger, adventure junkie and science geek Sean Riley participates in various tough fixes- repairs and renovations done on equipment that is very large or dangerous. He will work with other specialized engineers and experts in order to tackle some uniquely difficult jobs such as a pressure dome replacement for an Air Seychelles Boeing 767-300ER, fixing of a cruise ships power generator in Grand Bahama Island, replacing a bridge in Utah, replacement of a nuclear turbine in Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, and many other grand and tough jobs.

programme.title: Ultimate Airport Dubai
programme.desc: A new plane park has been created to house a fleet of Boeing 777s during the airports 80 day, billion dollar runway upgrade project, but there is a massive slope to get in and out of it. Pushback Operator Mark Deardens skills are put to the test as he finds out if he can tow a 300 ton plane down the entry slope without careering out of control. Customs Officers find five huge packages hidden in the bottom of a passengers luggage. If the powder inside tests positive for heroin, itll be the biggest drugs haul at the airport in 10 years. And Line Maintenance Engineer Andy Tetley is called onto a plane with a defunct air conditioning system and a temperature of over 110 degrees. He has only a few hours to find out what is wrong and cool it down before its due to take off.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: The busy Christmas Season brings extra challenges with families escaping Sydney on vacation. But the airport is thrown into jeopardy of a shutdown with the discovery of an unidentified white powder on board an incoming flight. Speculation mounts about whether the powder is harmless, or the deadly terror weapon anthrax.

programme.title: New York Super Airport
programme.desc: LaGuardia Airport is hemmed in by river and roads, so designers must push the limits of a tight site by building as tall as possible. This means a vast 120-foot-long escalator is needed to move passengers between floors. But the install hangs precariously in the balance. Below ground the team battles to prevent devastating floods, while above, they build a world-first; twin 450-foot-long pedestrian bridges that allow aircraft to pass beneath.

programme.title: New York Super Airport
programme.desc: Construction crews battle to stay on schedule; they must build new gates before they tear down the old or operations will grind to a halt. The team digs foundations for a new concourse 200-feet deep into reclaimed land but hits trouble that could delay the build. New York ironworkers fight to connect their biggest truss yet, which will form the terminals grand entrance, while flocking waterfowl threaten to bring down aircraft.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Thirty-two years ago, a young female is found dead in the desert outside Phoenix - her body too badly decomposed to identify. Now, crime scene technician Stephanie Bourgois is joining forces with the DNA Doe Project to find the girls name and bring her home.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 38 years, the remains of a young woman - found murdered by the side of a freeway outside of Tyler, Texas - have sat inside a cardboard box in the Smith County Sheriffs Office. Now, with retirement looming, Detective David Turner is teaming up with the DNA Doe Project to solve the case, find her family and - finally - lay her to rest.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: Ever since life emerged, microbes, plants and animals have all sculpted the planets surface and atmosphere in the strangest of ways; fish poop creates islands; dead animals create mountains; plants help create continents. From rocks to rivers, life has crafted everything that makes our planet so special. But this power of change brings with it profound dangers. Life doesnt just create. It can also destroy.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time
programme.desc: New Orleans resilient residents exit the city, forming part of the Katrina diaspora. As they navigate the uncertainty of how and when they might restore their lives, a plan for a new New Orleans takes shape. The future of the devastated city hangs in the balance as its residents struggle to return, rebuild and restart their lives even 20 years later.

programme.title: Notre Dame: Race Against the Inferno
programme.desc: On 15th April 2019, during Holy Monday Mass, the worlds most famous cathedral caught fire. Notre-Dame de Paris was ablaze in minutes, as an epic battle unfolded for heroic French firefighters. Under the gaze of the worlds media, they fought the inferno for more than 15 hours. Exclusive footage and interviews bring vividly to life the moment-by-moment courage of the Paris fire and police services, as they put their lives on the line to save this historic building.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: A fishermans tip leads Air and Marine agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands to over 80 kilos of cocaine washed ashore on a public beach. Two fishing vessels are intercepted between the Dominican Republic and Puerto Rico, suspected of smuggling drugs. Agents from the Fajardo unit patrol remote trails showing signs of drug trafficking routes.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: U.S. Virgin Islands Air and Marine agents chase a boat through international waters into the British Virgin Islands, ultimately seizing over 1,800 kilos of cocaine. The Mayaguez unit responds to a call about a capsized migrant vessel and finds suspicious bundles floating at sea. Agent Andujar and his team in Fajardo come across suspected smugglers operating a modified vessel.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Thirty-two years ago, a young female is found dead in the desert outside Phoenix - her body too badly decomposed to identify. Now, crime scene technician Stephanie Bourgois is joining forces with the DNA Doe Project to find the girls name and bring her home.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 38 years, the remains of a young woman - found murdered by the side of a freeway outside of Tyler, Texas - have sat inside a cardboard box in the Smith County Sheriffs Office. Now, with retirement looming, Detective David Turner is teaming up with the DNA Doe Project to solve the case, find her family and - finally - lay her to rest.

programme.title: Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time
programme.desc: In post-Katrina New Orleans, Gen. Honore leads rescue efforts amid pressure to use force, while local heroes tirelessly save lives. Thousands remain stranded in their homes, the Superdome, the convention center, and along the interstate as evacuation efforts continue to fail. Tensions rise while violence erupts and militias target residents.

programme.title: Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time
programme.desc: New Orleans resilient residents exit the city, forming part of the Katrina diaspora. As they navigate the uncertainty of how and when they might restore their lives, a plan for a new New Orleans takes shape. The future of the devastated city hangs in the balance as its residents struggle to return, rebuild and restart their lives even 20 years later.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana investigates the global phenomenon of armored car heists, responsible for some of the most brazen and dangerous robberies in the world. In Los Angeles and in Johannesburg, shell meet crews, learn how they plan their attacks, and go behind the scenes to understand the ever-expanding arms race between these criminals and the private security companies trying to stop them.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: At the California border, CBP searches a suspicious bulletproof truck and stops an SUV loaded with over $200,000 worth of concealed methamphetamine. Atlanta CBP Rovers hunt for smuggled cash, uncovering over $100,000 in counterfeit hundred dollar bills. And AMO executes Operation Blood Moon in the skies and waters around Puerto Rico. A high speed chase leads the agents to a seizure of nearly 2000 kilos of cocaine worth over $72 million.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: In Philly, CBP intercepts two shipping containers of bananas from the Dominican Republic loaded with 192 kilos of cocaine worth $13,500,000. In El Paso, CBP discovers over 40 kilos of marijuana underneath the hood of a car and HSI attempts a controlled delivery in town. In Fort Lauderdale, CBP officers stop a passenger traveling with suspicious boxes hidden inside bags of ginger and another with illegal pills.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler

programme.title: Science of Stupid

In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Inside Incredible Machines
programme.desc: For forty years, Nimitz class aircraft carriers have delivered US military might wherever it is needed, anywhere on the globe. But now, this legendary design is being phased out and new carriers are planned. But until theyre ready, the giant Nimitz ships have to be kept at the forefront of military technology. In this episode, engineer and host Chad Zdenek spends a week on board the USS Carl Vinson to work with the highly trained specialist engineers, mechanics and sailors who keep this incredible floating city in perfect working order during a critical mission in the Pacific - training twenty F18 pilots who have never taken off from an Aircraft Carrier before. This gives Chad the chance to discover the five engineering innovations at the heart of Americas most incredible Aircraft Carrier.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Reality series in which professional rigger, adventure junkie and science geek Sean Riley participates in various tough fixes- repairs and renovations done on equipment that is very large or dangerous. He will work with other specialized engineers and experts in order to tackle some uniquely difficult jobs such as a pressure dome replacement for an Air Seychelles Boeing 767-300ER, fixing of a cruise ships power generator in Grand Bahama Island, replacing a bridge in Utah, replacement of a nuclear turbine in Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, and many other grand and tough jobs.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Reality series in which professional rigger, adventure junkie and science geek Sean Riley participates in various tough fixes- repairs and renovations done on equipment that is very large or dangerous. He will work with other specialized engineers and experts in order to tackle some uniquely difficult jobs such as a pressure dome replacement for an Air Seychelles Boeing 767-300ER, fixing of a cruise ships power generator in Grand Bahama Island, replacing a bridge in Utah, replacement of a nuclear turbine in Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, and many other grand and tough jobs.

programme.title: Port Security: Hamburg
programme.desc: The Port of Hamburg is the key hub for Germanys import and export business so invariably smugglers from all over the world try to take advantage of this to channel drugs, weapons and pirated products. We will follow customs officers targeted operations from suspicious freight going out to its impounding in Hamburg. We will be given exclusive insights into the work of Germanys most successful customs office and its confiscation of drugs and goods.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: In the newly discovered tomb complex at Saqqara, one burial chamber stands out. It holds a single, stone sarcophagus while the rest are packed with mummies. Dr Ramadan Hussein and his team face their biggest challenge yet as they battle to lift the 5 ton lid and reveal the mummy within. Using forensic investigation techniques and the latest technology, what secrets can they discover about the tombs 2600-year old owner?

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: Inside the ancient Egyptian necropolis of Saqqara, Dr Ramadan Hussein and his team work to uncover a unique tomb complex. Ramadan is intrigued by a wall at the bottom of the 100 foot shaft. A hunch tells him it could be a hidden burial chamber. What secrets could it hold? The team have to work fast to remove the unstable rock, but their risky search leads them to one of the biggest discoveries of the dig so far.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Using cutting edge technology to strip back the layers of time, Explorer Albert Lin searches Israel for evidence of a lost city of the Canaanites. Along the coasts of Scotland, Albert explores a cave where the mysterious Picts sought refuge from the invading Roman armies. And in Sudan, Alberts expedition takes him to a flooded tomb and a sacred mountain believed to be the birthplace of the gods.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: On a mission to unlock the secrets of our lost cities, Explorer Albert Lin climbs high into the dense cloud forests of Peru to reveal the lost world of the Chachapoya. Traversing the remote mountains of Oman, Albert seeks to uncover how the ancient Magani sourced precious natural resources. And in the Mexican jungle, Albert searches for an ancient lost city of the Maya near a sacred mountain.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On January 15, 2009, US Airways Flight 1549 took off from New York Citys LaGuardia Airport and collided with a flock of birds, causing both engines to fail. Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger and co-pilot Jeffrey Skyles successfully performed an emergency landing in the Hudson River, saving all 155 people on board. Survivors of the "Miracle on the Hudson" share their experiences.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to San Francisco from LAX, Pacific Southwest Airlines Flight #1771 is cruising high above the California countryside. Apart from some mild turbulence, the routine regional flight is uneventful. That is, until the pilots hear gunshots in the cabin. They report the gunfire to the tower and moments later, the aircraft falls into a steep dive and crashes into a remote field. With 43 people dead and a possible crime on board, investigators from both the NTSB and FBI must work together to determine what happened, who had a motive and access, and who the intended victim was.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: SAS Flight #686 Boeing MD-87 October 8th, 2001 A heavy fog blankets Milans Linate Airport as SAS Flight #686 prepares for a routine flight to Copenhagen. Facing almost zero-visibility, the pilots rely entirely on ground controllers as they navigate into position for takeoff. The plane accelerates down the runway, but as it lifts off it collides with a Cessna in its path. The Cessna erupts in flames. The MD-87 slams to the ground and slides into an baggage hangar. The plane explodes on impact. It is the worst accident in Italian aviation history and the investigation uncovers a shocking series of errors. In the aftermath, an airport is transformed and those deemed responsible are sentenced in court.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Guarded by the Terracotta Warriors, the tomb of the First Emperor is so revered that it has never been opened. But now, for the first time ever, Sam Willis and his team of experts use new laser drone technology to investigate. What they reveal has never been seen before, and it provides new insight into what lies inside the tomb itself, as they piece together the Emperors vast mausoleum - an entire, stunning city of the dead.

programme.title: Forbidden Tomb of Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Mongolia is being plundered. Illegal gold mining operations are proliferating across its vast landscape, desecrating its soil and polluting its rivers. The lost tomb of Genghis Khan, Mongolias best-kept secret and only remaining tie to its spiritual and political forefather, could be unearthed and destroyed at any time. Can American engineer and explorer ALBERT LIN, equipped with cutting-edge technology and just a handful of obscure clues from ancient texts, find and protect the tomb of the Great Khan before it is destroyed? Alberts expedition has the blessing of the Mongolian government, but he has been forbidden to dig. In THE SEARCH FOR GENGHIS KHAN, we join Albert on a quest that seems impossible: to find a body without a shovel, somewhere in a territory that measures thousands of square miles in area. Lins research leads him to search for a lost mountain-the Burkhan Khaldun-in the heart of the "forbidden zone." But to get there he must first conquer a series of natural obstacles, including an inhospitable landscape, swollen rivers, and violent storms. It is on the Burkhan Khaldun that Lin makes his most remarkable discovery, one that may solve an 800-year old mystery and cause waves in the archaeological community for decades to come.

programme.title: Quest for King Solomons Treasure
programme.desc: Countless treasure-seekers have set off in search of King Solomons mines a quest inspired by the Bibles account of spectacular temples adorned in glittering gold and copper. To date, any evidence that supports Solomons existence is regarded as highly controversial. Expeditions in 2010 revealed groundbreaking new clues buried in the Jordanian desert for centuries.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Angkor: Ancient Laos Revealed
programme.desc: An international team of archaeologists investigate a hoard of priceless ancient treasure discovered in the southeast Asian nation of Laos. Their mission takes them to temple sites in the jungle. Aerial scanning technology targets new areas for excavation where astonishing new discoveries are made as they as they explore the origins of the civilisation that built the great city of Angkor.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Angkor: Ancient Laos Revealed
programme.desc: A team of archaeologists investigate a priceless hoard of ancient treasure discovered in Laos. Their quest takes them to temple sites in the southeast Asian jungle as they try to find out who the stunning treasure belonged to and what it was used for. Astonishing new discoveries of gold and human remains open a window into the early years of the civilisation that built the great city of Angkor.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: In the shadow of the worlds oldest pyramids, a team of archaeologists led by Dr Ramadan Hussein have made the discovery of a lifetime - a fully intact burial complex buried deep beneath the sand. Packed with treasures and world firsts, the site has the potential to re-write the book on mummification, unlocking secrets forgotten since the age of the pharaohs. Now the team have to open every sarcophagus, investigate every mystery and decode every clue in this never before seen discovery - the first Egyptian funeral parlour ever found.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: In the shadow of the worlds oldest pyramids, a team of archaeologists led by Dr Ramadan Hussein have made the discovery of a lifetime - a fully intact burial complex buried deep beneath the sand. programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: At the end of the last Ice Age, the first humans migrated into the Americas. Some believe they travelled overland, but now archaeologists are looking to the coast. And what does a 13,000-year-old skeleton found in the Mexican jungle tell us about these people and their world? By draining ta deep, underground cave, we reveal the new science rewriting the epic story of the first humans to live in the New World

Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Restaurants at the End of the World
programme.desc: Kristen Kish travels 12 miles offshore to Maines North Haven Island where new chef Carolynn is looking to put her Southern twist on Turner Farms classic barn supper menu. Kristen pulls lobsters and oysters from the cold waters and discovers what makes the islands goat milk so special as she helps Carolynn try to win the locals over with a spicier take on their venerated favorites.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsey sets out on a journey to some of the worlds most remote locations, where hell be looking for an adventure of the culinary kind. Basking in the culture of each setting he ends up, his cooking has never been more inspired than when on such an adventure. Whether hes cooking at altitude in Peru or educating himself on Alaskan cuisine, Gordon is experiencing the world like never before and beautifully curating a delicious morsel for each setting. Its a far cry from the professional kitchen hes used to and hes handling ingredients that are completely new, but the food doesnt get better than this.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay discovers why Maine, United States, is called the lobster capital of the world. Along the rugged coastline, he struggles to keep up with a team of lobster fisherwomen, dives for clams, harvests oysters, forages in freezing waters, and tests his lumberjack skills. Can he earn the status of a tough Mainer as he tests his culinary skills against local legend, chef Melissa Kelly, a two time James Beard award-winner?

programme.title: No Taste Like Home with Antoni Porowski
programme.desc: Seeking the origins of a family pasta dish, Antoni takes Justin on an Italian road trip full of delicious discoveries and surprising revelations. From chasing chickens to harvesting clams, they sample the regions finest food and uncover how Justins Italian ancestry relates to a family dish that made its way across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Tucci in Italy
programme.desc: Stanley delves into the complex identity of Italys northernmost region, where many speak German as well as Italian. He samples an unexpectedly delicious hay soup, skis down a mountain to experience Dirndl Day, eats slope-side polenta, and fly-fishes in a glacial river. Along the way, he uncovers a history of border conflict, which has left its mark on the people and their food.

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series, narrated by amazing actress Angela Bassett, presents a two-part journey through the life cycle of one of the planets last real wildernesses and tells the captivating tale of varios animals that live in the heart of Africas Okavango Delta. Surrounded by the Kalahari Desert, the delta is a place of spectacular natural dramas where the lives of tens of thousands of animals each year depend on The Great Flood. Okawango welcomes leopards, elephants, lions, hippos,... each year as the great flood returns water to the habitat, and when the waters recede, the battle for survival begins.

programme.title: Africas Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: Instead of providing in-depth examinations of the fauna of the continent of Africa, this nature series alternatively focuses on the hostile and unforgiving landscapes that the animals have to survive in. Africa is home to some of the most extreme and diverse environments on the planet, from arid deserts to lush rainforests, mountainous peaks to mighty river and lake systems, savannah grasslands to rugged coastline. This show explores these different regions and documents how the plants and creatures that inhabit them endure places where there are few resources of food and water or where competition is rife and life-threatening. The unique demands placed on these plants and animals have resulted in the development of incredibly resilient species that remain successful against all the odds.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: A young jaguar is about to embark on the most important mission of his life, : to strike out and find a kingdom of his own. His journey will take him through varied habitats, each with its own cast of animals. Only if he can prove his worth will the jaguar be able to claim his throne in one of the last truly wild paradises on the planet.

programme.title: Africas Deadly Kingdom

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads to the mysterious blue depths to discover which animal dominates the sea. His first encounter is with a tiger shark, the notorious hunter shaped like a torpedo and armed with ferocious teeth! Next, Phil dives with a group of magnificent manta rays and listens to the songs of one of the largest creatures on Earth, the majestic humpback whale.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves to discover which animal is truly built to survive the mud and muck. He encounters a feisty mud crab with huge pincers and catches a shovel-nosed ray with his bare hands. Finally, Phil faces a creature we all love to hate—the mosquito—and discovers theres more to these tiny bloodsuckers than meets the eye.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: From the largest waterfall on earth to the highest mountain in South America: Argentina is a country of extremes. Species-rich rainforests, rugged coasts, endless expanses and icy glaciers form a unique natural paradise. This three-part series delves into the extraordinary wildlife of Argentinas most diverse habitats.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: From the largest waterfall on earth to the highest mountain in South America: Argentina is a country of extremes. programme.title: Wild Mississippi
programme.desc: North Americas most famous waterway, the Mississippi River, is explored in this fantastic documentary series, focussing on the vast numbers of animals that depend on it for survival. With stunning cinematography that highlights its beauty and size, Wild Mississippi reveals the diverse climates and landscapes this enormous waterway covers, with its basin stretching for thousands of miles. A three-part series, each episode focusses on a unique aspect of the river, whether its the cold, frozen birth as it falls south from the northern states, the floods it causes, both beneficial and detrimental to animals and humans alike, as well as its negative effects, such as the masses of fertiliser it carries into the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Compilations
programme.desc: Theres not much that Dr. Jan Pol hasnt seen throughout his long, veterinarian career. The Dutch-born veterinarian has been helping animals since he graduated from Utrecht University in 1970. In this series we look back at memorable moments from his reality series, The Incredible Dr. Pol, where alongside his employees and his family he helps nurse a variety of creatures back to health from his Michigan-based practice. His clients come in all shapes and sizes, often needing urgent medical assistance, something that Dr. Jan Pol lives for. The passionate veterinarian is always keen to help, and we revisit the original series greatest moments.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland to discover which of the island-dwelling animals is truly built to survive. First up, he meets the enigmatic green turtle on the Wellesley Islands. Next, he is on KGari (Fraser Island), where he tracks down a pack of the notorious dingoes. Finally, he encounters the formidable and aptly named death adder snake.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin dares into the Australian savannah to find the species most built to survive. First is Australias largest bird of prey, the majestic but intimidating wedge-tailed eagle. Next, Phil tracks down one of the worlds deadliest snakes, the coastal taipan. Finally, Phil faces the uniquely Australian frill-necked lizard, a reptile with fascinating defense mechanisms.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Reality series following husband and wife veterinarians Ben and Erin Schroeder as they tend to animals in rural Nebraska. In this picturesque corner of the midwestern state, doctors Ben and Erin do all they can to ensure the local animals get the attention and care they deserve. Braving fierce blizzards, treacherous tornados and scorching summers, the pair of veterinarians let nothing stop them from administering medical treatment to local livestock.

The unique demands placed on these plants and animals have resulted in the development of incredibly resilient species that remain successful against all the odds.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Documentary series featuring fearsome fights between the biggest and the baddest animals on planet. Watch the animals fighting for their food, territory, rights and life. Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin dares into the Australian savannah to find the species most built to survive. First is Australias largest bird of prey, the majestic but intimidating wedge-tailed eagle. Next, Phil tracks down one of the worlds deadliest snakes, the coastal taipan. Finally, Phil faces the uniquely Australian frill-necked lizard, a reptile with fascinating defense mechanisms.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australias woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australias most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms of China
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Visiting forests, jungles, mountains and grasslands, we take a rare glimpse at parts of China that usually remain unseen. We see the wildlife that live amongst the stunning beauty of the Chinese landscapes - and how they survive in often demanding situations. With golden snub-nosed monkeys, bears, bees, elephants and the legendary giant panda. The Hidden Kingdoms of China is narrated by Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: A young jaguar is about to embark on the most important mission of his life, : to strike out and find a kingdom of his own. His journey will take him through varied habitats, each with its own cast of animals. Only if he can prove his worth will the jaguar be able to claim his throne in one of the last truly wild paradises on the planet.

programme.title: Wild Argentina
programme.desc: Whether right whales, penguins or sea lions - for the birth of their young, many marine creatures are drawn to Argentinas nearly 5,000 kilometer coastline. From their very first breath, its all about one thing for the little ones: survival. Orcas hunt for young sea lions with a special technique and seagulls fly merciless aerial attacks on baby whales. Extraordinary underwater images and impressive animal behavior make the film by Christian Baumeister a visual experience.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: In Argentinas breathtaking, yet imposing wilderness, every day is a fight for survival. The terrain is rugged and parched. The air is thin. The weather can change in an instant. And then there are the predators. A female puma stalks a valley in search of guanaco, while a tarantula defends itself against a hungry armadillo. Foxes will scavenge what they can…until one of the worlds largest vultures shows up. All the while, in the background, glaciers greedily hold on to the freshwater these animals so desperately need.

programme.title: NBA Special
programme.desc: Get the highlights of the untold stories of Scottish basketball. A look back on the fierce rivalry between Edinburgh and Falkirk that started a golden era for the sport in the 1980s, and the success of the national team at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

programme.title: NBA. Oklahomasitijas "Thunder" - Indiānas "Pacers"
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Mazulis, Vola un Viljams dodas uz Hidrotelpu, lai lielajā pļakšbumbas finālā sacenstos ar Ēnas komandu. Detektīvs Haizivs Mazulis un Viljams Vatsons apvienojas ar Henku, lai palīdzētu izpestīt Slienu Henku no nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atver Vindzoru dārzu pirmo dzīvnieku viesnīcu, kad pie viņa apmetas Lakijs. Bāzs parkā izveidojis minigolfu, bet vai tas ir tiešām neuzveicams, kā viņš apgalvo? Kā lai Padingtons notur nūju?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons kopā ar bērniem dzird Brauna kunga plānu pārdot māju. Vai viņiem būs jāpamet Vindzoru dārzi? Bērni spēlējas dārzā un atrod ko asu. Kaut kas nav kārtībā, tāpēc Padingtons lūdz Bāza palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Uz Padingtonu lielu iespaidu atstāj ugunsdzēsēju runa par drošību. Kad notiek īsta nelaime, Padingtons steidz palīgā. Mateo un Džūdija nodibina slepenu klubu koka mājā, bet liedz Džonatanam un Padingtonam tajā iestāties bez paroles.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Pasaulē mazākajā kulinārijas šovā pasaulē mazākais šefpavārs gatavo pasaulē mazākos ēdienus.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Briežu komanda atgriezusies ar jauniem, neticamiem piedzīvojumiem un varonīgām glābšanas misijām. Trešajā sezonā drosmīgā komanda uzzina vairāk par brīnišķīgo visumu, atklāj neticamo Mirdzumu salu un izpēta Mirdzumu jūras dzelmi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir nakts, un debesīs redzamas zvaigznes. Mamma un tētis ļauj Pepai un Džordžam uzvilkt mēteļus un iziet ārā skatīties zvaigznes. Zvaigznes izskatās mazas, bet, kad Pepa un Džordžs skatās caur teleskopu, tās šķiet lielākas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad Pepa un Sūzija uzzina, ka pieaugušajiem visu dienu jāstrādā, viņas nolemj spēlēties veikalos. Drīz vien viņām tas apnīk.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni izbraucienā pamana varavīksni.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Atrodot Vectēva laika kapsulu, Mazulis un Viljams pārcenšas, veidojot paši savu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Barbagudrais uztaisa dekoderi, kas tulko dzīvnieku skaņas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni ved Padingtonu uz Londonu, lai atzīmētu viņa dzimšanas dienu, bet ceļā viņš pazūd! Padingtons nonāk Londonas Tauerā un sastop dārgumus, sargus un karalisko pāri!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons gatavo lipekli, bet vai viņš spēs turēt doto vārdu neradīt jucekli, kad lietas vairs nav kontrolējamas? Padingtons un Simi dodas brīnumainā ceļojumā pa cilvēka ķermeni, lai redzētu, vai apēsta ābola sēkliņa vēderā var izaugt par koku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Tērauds raizējas, ka Lolas debesu māksla ietekmē viņa cepuru stenda popularitāti, tāpēc viņš izjauc viņas darbus. Briežu komanda sacenšas, lai redzētu, kura auto ir ātrāks, bet Tērauds negaidīti pievienojas.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atklāj, ka Karija kunga atvaļinājuma laikā ir laistījis aplamu augu. Brauna kundze grib, lai Vindzoras dārzi mākslinieciski izpaužas. Padingtons nezina, kas ir māksla, tāpēc izlemj noskaidrot, kas viņam padodas.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Haizivs Mazuļa un draugu piedalīšanās grupu konkursā saasina Mazuļa un Ēnas sāncensību.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus? Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Pasaulē mazākajā kulinārijas šovā pasaulē mazākais šefpavārs gatavo pasaulē mazākos ēdienus.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Sera Tērauda izdarības zem ūdens izraisa nemierus vaļu vidū. Briežu komandai pēc nemieriem jāatrod vaļu mazulis. Džeida uziet neparastus pēdu nospiedumus, kas varētu būt Ledus troļļa. Lai veiktu izmeklēšanu, viņa sauc palīgā Briežu komandu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pedro ir lipīgs klepus, drīz vien saslimst arī pārējie bērni. Kad laiks doties, saslimst arī pieaugušie. Arī Gazeles jaunkundze. Dakteris Lācis iedod negaršīgas zāles, bet kas rūpēsies par viņu, kad viņš saslims?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētim ir bibliotēkas grāmata, ko viņš paturējis par ilgu. Ģimene dodas uz bibliotēku to atdot un atrod vēl citas grāmatas, ko lasīt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni dodas brīvdienās īpašā auto. Pepa ir pārsteigta, atklājot, ka ar pogas spiedienu tas pārvēršas par mājiņu, kurā gulēt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Vola dzīvnieku izstādē sarīko dzīvnieku adopcijas ballīti.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni grib izgudrot, kā Da Vinči. Bērniem jāizlemj - doties baseinā vai izbraucienā ar riteņiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo un Barbalala kļūst par maziem dumpiniekiem. Bet kas ir Barbatētis?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš un Karte palīdz tēvocim Tesoro atrast pazaudētos dārgumu pēddziņus un atkal kļūt par dārgumu karti. Dora un Zābaciņš pēta noslēpumainu atslēgu, lai iepazītu Doras vecvecvecmāmiņu - pašu pirmo zinātkāro pētnieci.

Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kungs ir pārliecināts, ka parka ezerā mīt briesmonis, un Padingtons dodas palīgā to pierādīt. Ir Tēva diena, un Toka vēlas nodot ziņu savam tētim, kurš ir kosmosā, ka ik dienu domā par viņu. Varbūt Braunu ģimene spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pasaules Grāmatu dienā Padingtons palīdz Mateo atkal iemīlēt grāmatu lasīšanu un atklāt iemīļotāko tēlu, par kuru pārģērbties. Padingtons, Simi un Džonatans uz parka salas medī dinozauru, bet dinozauri taču vairs neeksistē, vai tiesa?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons nejauši iznīcina vāveres riekstu krātuvi, tāpēc ielūdz savvaļas dzīvnieku dzīvot mājā. Džūdijai uzdāvina spiegošanas komplektu, Bērdas kundze sāk aizdomīgi izturēties, tāpēc bērni un Padingtons izseko viņu ar spiegu rīkiem.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sarīko Mateo dzimšanas dienas svinības, bet viss nenotiek kā iecerēts. Vai Braunas kundzes klauns izglābs situāciju? Padingtons nejauši spēles laikā atdod Džonatana reto Robotiņa kartīti. Kā viņš to atgūs?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Bērdas kundzes diena, un Padingtons grib izmantot tortē marmelādi no īpašās burkas, taču neviens to nespēj atvērt. Kā viņš izrādīs pateicību? Padingtons un Mateo nodibina galda tenisa komandu un pārspēj huligānus, lai spēlēt varētu visi.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoras parkā notiks ikgadējais jautrais skrējiens, bet Padingtons nav formā, tāpēc Bērdas kundze izlemj trenēt viņu. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons nejauši salauž Bērdas kundzes šūpuļkrēslu. Kā viņi to salabos, lai viņa neuzzinātu?

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs

programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Kad Haizivs mazulim patiešām izkrīt zobs, tā meklējumos viņš un Viljams rod negaidītu sabiedroto.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Mazais Šefpavāriņš, Olijs, Rūbija un Henrijs sacenšas gadskārtējās Seleriju spēlēs. Bet Šefpavāriņš, kurš pieradis uzvarēt, cīnās ar spēcīgiem konkurentiem. Kad Šefpavāriņam un Olijam pazūd salāti, abi kļūst par dārzeņu detektīviem un lietu risina.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Briežu komanda atgriezusies ar jauniem, neticamiem piedzīvojumiem un varonīgām glābšanas misijām. Trešajā sezonā drosmīgā komanda uzzina vairāk par brīnišķīgo visumu, atklāj neticamo Mirdzumu salu un izpēta Mirdzumu jūras dzelmi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar ģimeni devušies brīvdienās ar kemperu. Viņi nolemj apmeklēt Pīļu zemi, īpašu parku, kur var redzēt pīles upē. Viņi ir pārsteigti, uzzinot, ka kempers pārvēršas par laivu!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs aiznes dārzeņu mizas vectēva kompostam. Tārpi tvertnē pārvērš mizas par kompostu, ko vecvecāki izmanto, lai augi labāk augtu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Trusis Ričards ierodas spēlēties ar Džordžu, un aita Sūzija - ar Pepu! Puikas un meitenes negrib spēlēt tās pašas spēles, bet viņiem visiem patīk lēkāt dubļu peļķēs.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. Thats everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Its time for the band to make their first music video. Both Tomika and Freddie have ideas, but totally different ones. This causes tension in the band, as the two of them keep arguing. They cant make the video with the two of them fighting, so Mr Finn tells them they will shoot it without them. He hopes this would make them rejoin the band and give up their discussion. But it doesnt work, so they need a new solution if they want the whole band in the video.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!
